channel.title: [317] How To Add Fix "Non-Existing Item"
channel.description:
Today ill be fixing "vesta long" error. this works with any item.
[size=14pt][shadow=black,left]Step One:[/shadow][/size] Open "config" folder. Open "item" [IMG]http://i1192.photobucket.com/albums/aa325/gimpics11/1.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Step Two:[/size] Copy any code (for vesta long i prefer AGS)
[size=14pt][u][b]2.1[/b][/u][/size] Now Change name etc and edit stats Should look like this: [code]item = 9802 Vesta's_longsword Beast_sword. 480 480 480 0 150 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 140 8[/code]
This is short and easy, Hope it helped you a little. Comment

item.title: [317] How To Add Fix "Non-Existing Item"
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

Today ill be fixing “vesta long” error.
this works with any item.

[size=14pt][shadow=black,left]Step One:[/shadow][/size]
Open “config” folder.
Open “item”

1.jpg891×431

[size=14pt]Step Two:[/size]
Copy any code (for vesta long i prefer AGS)

[size=14pt]2.1[/size]
Now Change name etc and edit stats
Should look like this:

item = 9802	 Vesta's_longsword	Beast_sword.	480	480	480	0	150	80	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	140	8

This is short and easy, Hope it helped you a little.
Comment
